column4: Anyone know what happened to current session tab in sessions in intrepid?
because it was old and crufty. the fundamentals of the new gnome-session are very sound, but it's also very half-baked in intrepid
I am trying to stop gnome panel from starting up in sessions, but I dont see an entry, do you where it could be ?
found it, in gconf of course :)
don't thank me, thank google; I'd never have figured that out on my own :)
how do u delete the key in it? I dont see a remove key option
don't delete the key, remove the entry from the list
how? I dont see an option or do I make it empty ?
ah, you're looking at the wrong thing, don't go into the required_components folder
there's a string list key called required_components_list inside of /desktop/gnome/session
